video_download_header_0: Add the YT URL then Download
menuplots_tooltip: Visualize dataset metrics using multiple plot types, including histogram, scatter, and bar charts.
console_output_tooltip: Shows the resources currently utilized by the Darkfusion engine, including memory, CPU, and GPU usage
label_progress_tooltip: Indicates the progress of Darkfusion processes, such as loading, labeling., or augmentations
muteCheckBox_tooltip: Plays notification sounds for key actions when enabled. Disabled by default.
voice_mode_checkbox_tooltip: Toggles shaded overlays for bounding boxes to improve visibility during review
classes_dropdown_tooltip: Lists all class names currently defined in the classes.txt file Set keybind in settings
styleComboBox_tooltip: Allows switching between various interface styles and themes for customization.
image_quality_checkbox_tooltip: Includes image quality metrics, such as resolution and sharpness, in the statistics report when activated
outline_Checkbox_tooltip: Highlights edges in the image to emphasize object boundaries
cfg_table_tooltip: adjust cfg or yaml to you choosing.
btn_open_file_tooltip: for darknet cfg file load before calculation anchors
import_yaml_button_tooltip: load a yaml  i.g coco.yaml for ultralyics
clusters_spinbox_tooltip: set how many mask in cfg
width_spinbox_tooltip: set the widght of final train images
height_spinbox_tooltip: set the height of final train data
show_checkbox_tooltip: display a visual output of anchors
hide_activation_checkbox_tooltip: hide activation function in the cfg
calculate_anchors_button_tooltip: activates anchor calucation ensure you load a cfg first.
btn_save_file_tooltip: saves the new cfg with updated anchors.
dropdown_tooltip: Choose between train.txt or valid.txt to specify which dataset you are managing.
output_button_tooltip: Save the generated training files (train.txt, valid.txt, obj.names, obj.yaml, obj.data) to a selected directory for both Darknet and Ultralytics training.
import_button_tooltip: oad images into the application to prepare them for training datasets.
valid_percent_tooltip: Set the percentage of images to be used for validation when splitting the dataset.
import_classes_button_tooltip: select classes.txt in a dataset directory
scan_button_tooltip: scans for various problems in the dataset.
size_input_tooltip: sets the size of images for mosaic
size_number_tooltip: ini. sets the number of mosaic images to make
sight_picture_tooltip: augmentation put a cross on target
mosaic_checkbox_tooltip: use the thumbnail directory to create a combined frame of images
image_format_combo_tooltip: format to save as png jpg.
limit_blanks_tooltip: % of the dataset to create negatives
process_image_button_tooltip: select the dataset to activate the process.
select_images_crop_tooltip: select the images to center crop
h_img_tooltip: set the height of crop i.e (416)
w_img_tooltip: set the width of crop i.e (416)
images_button_tooltip: selct the dir to adjust labels
patience_checkbox_tooltip: Sets the number of epochs to wait for improvement in model metrics before stopping the training early, helping prevent overfitting
amp_true_tooltip: Boost training speed and reduce memory usage by automatically adjusting the precision of computations
tensorboardCheckbox_tooltip: Visualize your model's training progress, analyze model graphs, and view histograms of weights, biases, or other tensors as they change over time
freeze_checkbox_tooltip: Freeze specified layers during training to retain pre-trained features while adapting the model to new data, improving training efficiency
resume_checkbox_tooltip: Continue training from the last checkpoint. Useful for extending training or fine-tuning on new data without starting from scratch
simplify_tooltip: Simplifies the model graph for ONNX exports with onnxslim, potentially improving performance and compatibility.
convert_model_tooltip: Target format for the exported model, such as 'onnx', 'torchscript', 'tensorflow', or others, defining compatibility with various deployment environments
use_gpu_checkbox_tooltip: Specifies the device for exporting: GPU (device=0), CPU (device=cpu), MPS for Apple silicon (device=mps) or DLA for NVIDIA Jetson (device=dla:0 or device=dla:1).
dynamic_true_tooltip: Allows dynamic input sizes for ONNX, TensorRT and OpenVINO exports, enhancing flexibility in handling varying image dimensions.
batch_input_spinbox_tooltip: Specifies export model batch inference size or the max number of images the exported model will process concurrently in predict mode.
int8_true_tooltip: Activates INT8 quantization, further compressing the model and speeding up inference with minimal accuracy loss, primarily for edge devices.
half_true_tooltip: Enables FP16 (half-precision) quantization, reducing model size and potentially speeding up inference on supported hardware.
pt_label_tooltip: Path to the model file for training.
batch_input_tooltip: Batch size, adjustable as integer or auto mode. AUTO -1
yaml_label_tooltip: Path to the dataset configuration file (e.g., coco8.yaml).
data_input_tooltip: Path to the dataset configuration file (e.g., coco8.yaml). This file contains dataset-specific parameters, including paths to training and validation data, class names, and number of classes.
save_runs_directory_tooltip: Enables saving of training checkpoints and final model weights.
model_input_tooltip: Specifies the model file for training. Accepts a path to either a .pt pretrained model or a .yaml configuration file. Essential for defining the model structure or initializing weights.
task_combobox_tooltip:
Select the YOLO task to train: 
- Detect: Object detection
- Segment: Instance segmentation
- Classify: Image classification
- Pose: Human pose estimation
- OBB: Oriented bounding boxes
show_chart_tooltip: activates dont_show command disabling chart when training
cache_input_tooltip: Enables caching of dataset images in memory
map_check_tooltip: drawing of chart of average-Loss and accuracy-mAP (-map flag) during training
browse_weights_tooltip: Specifies the model file for training. Accepts a path to either a .weights pretrained model or nothing to just use the cfg to train from scratch
data_label_tooltip: Path to the dataset configuration file (e.g., obj.data).
browse_cfg_tooltip: Specifies the cfg file for training. Accepts a path to  .cfg.
browse_data_tooltip: Path to the dataset configuration file (e.g., obj.data). This file contains dataset-specific parameters, including paths to training and validation data, class names, and number of classes.
List_view_tooltip: Left-click an index name in the list view to display the corresponding image in the UI.
img_index_search_tooltip: Enter an image name to quickly locate and display it in the UI.
preview_list_tooltip: In the preview list, left-click to display the image in the UI, or right-click to remove its associated label.
frame_10_tooltip: Enable this option to display cropped bounding boxes for manual review.
image_size_tooltip: Adjust the preview size of objects by sliding left to shrink or right to enlarge.
flash_time_spinbox_tooltip: Set the duration (in seconds) for how long the bounding box flashes after being clicked.
batch_size_spinbox_tooltip: Set the number of images to process in each batch for thumbnail creation and display.
filter_class_spinbox_tooltip: Set the filtered image press reivew to see or scroll through the images
preview_button_tooltip: activate to show all labled images
move_all_button_tooltip: Click 'Move' to relocate all images containing the filtered class(es) into a specified subfolder.
clear_all_button_tooltip: Click 'Clear' to remove all bounding boxes associated with the filtered class(es) from the dataset.
dont_show_img_checkbox_tooltip: Disable this option to generate thumbnails without displaying them, improving processing speed.
flash_color_button_tooltip: Choose the first color for the flashing bounding box effect.
alternate_flash_color_button_tooltip: Choose the second color for the flashing bounding box effect.
review_off_tooltip: Click to halt the review process and clear the UI for a fresh start.
height_box_tooltip: set the height for crop resize or display
custom_input_tooltip: enter number of frames to skip
width_box_tooltip: set the w/ for crop resize or display
monitor_tooltip: Displays the current image's position in the dataset (e.g., 12/5000)
remove_video_tooltip: remove a   yt video from table
video_download_tooltip: past a path to you a yt video
frame_27_tooltip: enabel and press next or previous to auto scan
total_images_tooltip: Shows the total number of images in your dataset.
auto_scan_checkbox_tooltip: Activate auto-scan mode by enabling this checkbox. Use 'Next' or 'Previous' to start scanning.
next_button_tooltip: Navigate to the next image in the dataset. set keybind in settings.
previous_button_tooltip: Navigate to the previous image in the dataset. set keybind in settings
delete_button_tooltip: Deletes the current image and its associated annotation (.txt) file. set keybind in settings
grayscale_Checkbox_tooltip: Converts the current image to greyscale for analysis
timmer_speed_tooltip: Adjust the delay between image transitions in auto-scan mode. Increase for slower scans, decrease for faster scans.
shade_slider_tooltip: Adjust brightness: slide left to lighten the image, right to darken it.
font_size_slider_tooltip: Adjust the size of bounding box labels: slide right to increase label size for better visibility.
max_label_tooltip: Define the maximum allowable size for bounding boxes during drawing. Reduce for smaller boxes or increase for larger ones
grey_scale_slider_tooltip: Adjust brightness for greyscale images: slide left to darken tones, slide right to lighten tones..
box_size_tooltip: Set the default minimum size for bounding boxes when drawing. Adjust to enforce size constraints.
network_height_tooltip: Specify the width of the image when using auto-labeling functions or configuring certain features that require size input
fp_select_combobox_tooltip: FP16 (16-bit floating point) and FP32 (32-bit floating point) refer to numerical precision formats in computing, where FP16 uses less memory and computational power for faster processing but may sacrifice accuracy compared to FP32, which offers higher precision and is better suited for tasks requiring detailed calculations.
network_width_tooltip: Specify the height of the image when using auto-labeling functions or configuring certain features that require size input
remove_input_tooltip: Deletes the selected class from the classes.txt file. Ensure you reload images to enforce saving.
fast_label_checkbox_tooltip: bypases logic to select box first allows quick labeling
list_input_tooltip: Manually enter the class names for detection. If no input is provided, the default class will be 'person'.
head_horizontal_tooltip: Shift the extra bounding box horizontally to fine-tune its position.
head_width_tooltip: Define the width of the extra bounding box. The default size overlaps with the detected
head_height_tooltip: djust the height of the extra bounding box to match your requirements
head_verticle_tooltip: Adjust the vertical position of the extra bounding box as needed.
heads_area_tooltip: Activate this option to manually create an additional bounding box using OpenCV.
class_id_tooltip: Assign a specific Class ID to the newly created bounding box
roi_checkbox_tooltip: Activate this option to define a region of interest (ROI) where bounding boxes will be removed from the scene.
y_spin_slider_tooltip: Adjust the ROI's horizontal position by moving it left or right.
height_spin_slider_2_tooltip: Set the height of the region of interest (ROI) in pixels.
x_spin_slider_tooltip: Adjust the ROI's vertical position by moving it up or down.
filter_button_tooltip: Click 'Execute' to remove all bounding boxes that fall outside the defined region of interest (ROI).
width_spin_slider_tooltip: Set the width of the region of interest (ROI) in pixels.
copy_paste_checkbox_tooltip: Activate this option to apply segmented images to all images in the dataset and save the augmented results in a subfolder.
process_folder_btn_tooltip: Click 'Execute All' to perform all selected actions, including box removal, augmentation, and noise reduction
shadow_var_tooltip: Activate this option to apply shadow augmentations to images and save the results in a subfolder.
screen_update_tooltip: Enabled by default to display the SAM model's actions directly on the screen for visual feedback
sam_model_tooltip: Select the SAM model for operations. The default option is SAM ViT_H.
overwrite_var_tooltip: Enable this to overwrite all bounding boxes, allowing corrections to the existing box coordinates.
noise_remove_checkbox_tooltip: Eliminates noise from the background of labeled images and saves the cleaned versions in a subfolder.
segmentation_mode_tooltip: Lists all class names currently defined in the classes.txt file Set keybind in settings
cache_tooltip: Enables caching of dataset images in memory
img_index_number_tooltip: Displays the current image's position in the dataset (e.g., 12/5000)
use_sahi_checkbox_tooltip: Activate auto-scan mode by enabling this checkbox. Use 'Next' or 'Previous' to start scanning.
rapid_del_checkbox_tooltip: Highlights edges in the image to emphasize object boundaries
shade_checkbox_tooltip: Toggles shaded overlays for bounding boxes to improve visibility during review
confidence_threshold_slider_tooltip: Adjust the size of bounding box labels: slide right to increase label size for better visibility.
batch_inference_tooltip: Set the default minimum size for bounding boxes when drawing. Adjust to enforce size constraints.
roi_checkbox_2_tooltip: Activate this option to define a region of interest (ROI) where bounding boxes will be removed from the scene.
height_spin_slider_tooltip: Set the height of the region of interest (ROI) in pixels.
width_spin_slider_2_tooltip: Set the width of the region of interest (ROI) in pixels.
x_spin_slider_2_tooltip: Adjust the ROI's vertical position by moving it up or down.
y_spin_slider_2_tooltip: Adjust the ROI's horizontal position by moving it left or right.
segmentation_checkbox_tooltip: Activate this option to apply segmented images to all images in the dataset and save the augmented results in a subfolder.
heatmap_Checkbox_tooltip: Highlights edges in the image to emphasize object boundaries
obb_checkbox_tooltip: Activate this option to apply segmented images to all images in the dataset and save the augmented results in a subfolder.
video_slider_tooltip: left to rewind, right to fast-forwar
debug_edge_display_checkbox_tooltip: Highlights edges in the image to emphasize object boundaries
